Description: Funerary papyrus of Gaperen containing Book of Breathing made by Isis for her brother Osiris written in hieratic script on the left side (sheet 1 of 2); judgement-scene vignette in yellow and blue (heads of figures lost).
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 45-48, pls. 25-26.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (63)
Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.45-49, pls.25-28)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57736) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57736)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured Black ink Pigment (loss, powdery) Backed: white paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
